about_the_game:
Potion Commotion Soundtrack - Featuring Ten Totally Terrific Tracks, totaling over twenty minutes of tremendous tunes.

Music composed by the talented, HMN Music. (be sure to check out his other work)

In-Game Bonuses

For purchasing & installing the Soundtrack, you will be rewarded with the following in-game goodies:
  • An instantly collectible 250 Tokens
  • Three Bonus Tokens for you to collect daily!
  • An exclusive Young Wogglebogg Costume
  • A cool new Chester the Jester Outfit
  • Four awesome Stamps for your in-game Stampbook

If you enjoyed Potion Commotion, then purchasing the Soundtrack is a brilliant way to go the extra mile to help support the Developer's work on future updates and projects.

  • Gingerbread House
  • Dance Of The Woodpecker
  • Sunbathing In The Rain
  • Talking To The Trees
  • The Quest For Eldershire
  • The Enchanted Garden
  • Marshmallow Moon
  • Running With Elves
  • Fantastic Fanfare
  • The NerdyBird Catches The Worm

Thank you so much for checking out this Album!
